name: GEETEST
author: Geetest

sections.description:
Getting tired of those CAPTCHA challenges that even human cannot understand? GeeTest offers user-friendly CAPTCHAs to protect your WordPress websites from spam attacking with high security.
As a pioneer in the bot management, GeeTest combines biometric data and artificial intelligence technology to create a better experience for users. In the last decade, GeeTest cooperates with over 320,000 enterprises worldwide including Airbnb, Binance, Xiaomi. GeeTest is passionate about solving bot problems.

GeeTest has released the latest product CAPTCHA v4.0 on wordpress, and integrated CAPTCHA 4.0 and CAPTCHA v3.0 in this plugin. Users can choose to use CAPTCHA 4.0 or CAPTCHA 3.0 that they need in this plugin.

View demo

View video

USE CAPTCHA v3.0 ON

  • Login
  • Register
  • Comment
  • Gravity Form

USE CAPTCHA v4.0 ON

  • Comment Form
  • Sign in
  • Sign up
  • Lost Password Form
  • WooCommerce Register
  • WooCommerce Login Form
  • WooCommerce Checkout Form
  • Woocommerce Lost Password Form
  • Gravity Form
  • Contact Form 7
  • bbPress New Topic
  • bbPress Reply to Topic
  • wpforms

FREE FEATURES

  • Free version with limited daily requests
  • Access to exlusive dashboard
  • Technical Support
  • Solution Consultancy
  • Data Retention

You can check out our website or contact us for more information if you need more than above:
* UI Customization
* CAPTCHA style customization
* Advanced risk management integration support
* Full Data Report
* 24/7/365 After-sale Service
* Support 78 languages
* Compatibility with other form plugins per request

How GeeTest CAPTCHA v4.0 works

Real-time Protection | 7-Layer Dynamic Approach
* GeeTest sensor detects signs of bot activities
* AI algorithms and GeeTest global risk database assess and validate the risk of suspicious requestÂ–
* Security policies act based on real-time monitoring and your customized demand

Data Visualization | Reporting & Analytics
* Traffic data is shown simultaneously on GeeTest Dashboard
* Data studio provides inclusive data analysis in charts and graphs that are shared in your GeeTest account and subaccounts
* Insights on bot mitigation could be reflected through the traffic trends.

Security Consulting | Current & Emerging Threat Management.
* Post-event analyses and consultations are available.

Personal Information protection

GeeTest will not share, transfer or disclose users’ information to any third party,
and we will try our best to avoid collecting unrelated data. Please refer to GeeTest Privacy Policy for more information.

Please note

We are working to integrate more forms and plugins. If there are any forms or plugins you need, please
feel free to contact us.
sections.installation:
Step 1: Upload geetest.php to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory
Step 2: Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress
Step 3: Visit GeeTest website and register an account
Step 4: Log in to GeeTest dashboard and create a new captcha. Then, you can get a captcha ID and key
Step 5: Enter your captcha ID and key in wordpress dashboard
sections.faq:
Support for this plugin is provided by the plugin author. You may find additional documentation here:
– Author website
– Support forum

Why use GeeTest CAPTCHA?

As experts at defensing bad bots for over 10 years, GeeTest offers enterprise level Captcha solution to protect your WordPress website from spam attacking with ultimate customer experience.

What is the difference between CAPTCHA v4.0 and CAPTCHA v3.0?

At the stability level, CAPTCHA V4.0 is fully upgraded in business, database architecture, maintenance and other aspects to ensure stability of disaster recovery. Since the architecture has been optimized, and stickiness between requests is removed, the service request will more stable than before. In addition, CATPCHA v4.0 supports more forms than CATPCHA v3.0.

7-layer dynamic security strategies generate tailored anti-bot protections targeting the changing bot attack and fraud trends.

GeeTest Invisible Mode mitigates bot attacks and fraud without presenting any CAPTCHA challenges or checkboxes.

Up to 5 types of innovative CAPTCHA are available.

Global distributed servers and clusters for quick response.

How to get GeeTest ID and key?

Step 1: please go to GeeTest website, follow the registration procedures to get a GeeTest account.

Step 2: Login to your account, create an application and add an event to gain ID and key.

Can I user this plugin in my language?

Yes, GeeTest supports English, Simplified Chinese, and Traditional Chinese in WordPress currently. If your language is not available, please contact us for more language support.
